pull.title: Fix translator comment for Restore Wallet `QInputDialog`
pull.body:
Fix translator comment for Restore Wallet `QInputDialog`, as suggested in https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/471#discussion_r917437779.

This also changes the window title name from `Restore Name` to `Restore Wallet` as it seems clearer.

rename.from: gui: Fix translator comment for Restore Wallet `QInputDialog`
rename.to: Fix translator comment for Restore Wallet `QInputDialog`

events.body:
<s>LGTM</s> ACK d7207dff67d42bc06a3ca6534fe510a4936bc439

- The added translation comment clearly explains the purpose of the text for which it is added.

A small nit:
I would suggest mentioning the title's renaming in the commit message as well.

**Edit:** Address [this](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui/pull/629#issuecomment-1189012029) comment. Thanks for notifying @hebasto!
ACK d7207dff67d42bc06a3ca6534fe510a4936bc439, verified using `make -C src translate`.

events.message:
gui: Fix translator comment for Restore Wallet QInputDialog

This also changes the window title name
from `Restore Name` to `Restore Wallet`.

events.body:
reACK 9d9a098530df9986039f64b2810b6375b715f196

Changes since my last review:
- The translator's comments have been updated.

I feel the updated translator comments are an improvement and better clarify the purpose of the title and label Qstrings.

comments.body: you're changing the window title name from `Restore Name` to `Restore Wallet`. If this is intended, please document in the PR description why you are doing this. The mentioned review comment doesn't suggest this.

For the consistency, do you mind adding a full stop to the end of the translator comments?

(here and above)
